PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-04442013-04-25,  ,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN,  NEB,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectCertificates of Public Convenience and Necessity OC-16, OC-28, OC-44, OC-52 and GC-39
PrecisOrder to issue Amending Orders AO-003-OC-16, AO-004-OC-28, AO-001-OC-44, AO-001-OC-52 and AO-001-GC-39 to vary the CERTIFICATES OF PUBLIC CONVENIENCE AND NECESSITY OC-16, OC-28, OC-44, OC-52 and GC-39 to reflect the change in name to Plains Midstream Canada ULC.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Certificates of Public Convenience and Necessity OC-16, OC-28, OC-44, OC-52 and GC-39
precis: Order to issue Amending Orders AO-003-OC-16, AO-004-OC-28, AO-001-OC-44, AO-001-OC-52 and AO-001-GC-39 to vary the CERTIFICATES OF PUBLIC CONVENIENCE AND NECESSITY OC-16, OC-28, OC-44, OC-52 and GC-39 to reflect the change in name to Plains Midstream Canada ULC.
